resources.string: Use the buttons on the Main menu to navigate to the other parts of the app. You can also toggle schedule notifications on and off from the menu bar.

The Schedule menu is navigated using the calendar. You can create a new schedule item by clicking on the plus button on the menu bar. Clicking on a date will take you to a listing of all schedule items for that date. If there are no schedule items, the app will simply inform you of that. You can update your schedule items by clicking on an item in the list. You can delete a schedule item by clicking and holding the item. A window will pop up asking you if you really want to delete the item. If you want to see all schedule items at the same time, you can access that list from the menu.

Creating, updating, and deleting notes works the same way as creating, updating, and deleting schedule items. New notes will automatically save when you click the back button if any text has been entered. You can also save notes using the save button on the menu bar.

The calculators are very simple to use. The basic calculator works just like any other basic calculator. The tip calculator requires all input fields to be filled. For the tip percentage, you can choose to use one of the three standard tip amounts, or you can enter your own tip in the custom tip field. If you have a number in the custom tip field, the calculator will automatically use that number over the other three options.
